articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Australia hosts largest-ever military war games - Al Jazeera
articles.description: This year, more than 35,000 military personnel from 19 nations are taking part in the drills over three weeks.
articles.content: Exercise Talisman Sabre, the largest ever war drills in Australia, is under way and expected to attract the attention of Chinese spy ships. Talisman Sabre began in 2005 as a biennial joint exercise b… [+1505 chars]
